text: Knall and Fall as Detectives () is a 1953 Austrian-West German comedy film directed by Hans Heinrich and starring Hans Richter, Rudolf Carl, and Ingrid Lutz. It was made as a sequel to the 1952 film Knall and Fall as Imposters. The film's sets were designed by Rolf Zehetbauer. ==Cast== ==References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:1953 comedy films Category:Austrian comedy films Category:German comedy films Category:Austrian films Category:West German films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Hans Heinrich Category:Austrian sequel films Category:German sequel films Category:Films scored by Hans Lang Category:Buddy comedy films
title: Knall and Fall as Detectives
